include-in-header.text:
<style> /* start of CSS */

  /* creates title block in header space */
  .quarto-title-block {
    /* removes container constraints */
    margin-top: 0 !important;
    padding-top: 0 !important;
    padding-bottom: 0 !important;
    margin-left: calc(50% - 50vw);
    /*continer to flexbox*/
    display: flex;
    /*stacks title, subtitle, and description */
    flex-direction: column;
    /*centers title, subtitle, and description horizontally and vertically */
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    /* makes height and width block fixed % of viewport */
    height: 80vh;
    width: 100vw;
    /* centers text inside element */
    text-align: center;
    /* removes default spacing */
    padding: 0;
    /* makes block relative point for positioning other elements */
    position: relative;
    /* background image */
    background-image: url("images/sample.png");
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
  }

  /* remove padding gap between navbar and header*/
  body[style*="padding-top"] { padding-top: 0 !important; }

  /* creates psuedo-element (overlay) before block */
  .quarto-title-block::before {
    content: "";
    /* position of overlay over the block */
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    /* 40% black overlay */
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    z-index: 0;
  }

  /* selects text */
  .quarto-title-block .title,
  .quarto-title-block .subtitle,
  .quarto-title-block .description {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    color: white;
  }

  /* specific title font preference */
  .title {
    font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 5rem);
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  }

  /* specific subtitle font preference */
  .subtitle {
    font-size: clamp(1rem, 2vw, 1.5rem);
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  /* specific description font preference */
  .description {
    font-size: clamp(0.9rem, 1.5vw, 1.2rem);
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
/* end of CSS */ </style>

markdown.markdown:
+:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------:+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| The Iacchei Lab is an academic research laboratory at Hawai'i Pacific University. Our lab uses a combination of field and molecular techniques to answer conservation and fisheries questions important to our local community. | ![](images/IMG_2947.jpg){.lightbox fig-align="center" width="656"} |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| See what our students are up to [here](team.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| Click [here](News.qmd) to see the Iacchei Lab in the news                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| Find out more about our research [here](Research.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                    |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+

The Iacchei Lab is an academic research laboratory at Hawaii Pacific University. Our lab uses a combination of field and molecular techniques to answer conservation and fisheries questions important to our local community.\
[Click here to find out more.](about.qmd)

</br>

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a Quarto website.

To learn more about Quarto websites, visit the [official documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/websites).
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
# Welcome to the Iacchei Lab!

+:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------:+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| The Iacchei Lab is an academic research laboratory at Hawai'i Pacific University. Our lab uses a combination of field and molecular techniques to answer conservation and fisheries questions important to our local community. | ![](images/IMG_2947.jpg){.lightbox fig-align="center" width="656"} |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| See what our students are up to [here](team.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| Click [here](News.qmd) to see the Iacchei Lab in the news                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| Find out more about our research [here](Research.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                    |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+

The Iacchei Lab is an academic research laboratory at Hawaii Pacific University. Our lab uses a combination of field and molecular techniques to answer conservation and fisheries questions important to our local community.\
[Click here to find out more.](about.qmd)

</br>

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a Quarto website.

To learn more about Quarto websites, visit the [official documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/websites).
